name: my_compute_factorial_it
description: Write an iterative function that returns the factorial of the number given as a parameter.

name: my_compute_factorial_rec
description: Write a recursive function that returns the factorial of the number given as a parameter.

name: my_compute_power_it
description: Write an iterative function that returns the first argument raised to the power p, where p is the second argument.

name: my_compute_power_rec
description: Write an recursive function that returns the first argument raised to the power p, where p is the second argument.

name: my_compute_square_root
description: Write a function that returns the square root (if it is a whole number) of the number given as argument. If the square root is not a whole number, the function should return 0

name: my_is_prime
description: Write a function that returns 1 if the number is prime and 0 if not.

name: my_find_prime_sup
description: Write a function that returns the smallest prime number that is greater than, or equal to, the number given as a parameter.

name: count_valid_queens_placements
description: Write a function that compute recursively and returns the number of possible ways to place n queens on a nxn chessboard without them being able to run into each other in a single move.
